channel.title: Konstantin Stupin on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Konstantin Stupin on Rusland 1

item.title: Konstantin Stupin – When I Died
item.description: Когда я умер взорвалось солнце: when I died, the sun exploded. And сметая звезды: swept away the stars. Online sources that reveal the lyrics contradict each other on details. See & compare, for example, Tekstovoi.ru and – with chords as a bonus – MyChords.
